page.title: 07Felixstowe Amusements
page.content: In Felixstowe there are 4 arcades and Charlie Mannings{amusement park. In the park are rides such as the { Dodgems}and a{Roller Coaster}called the Wild Cat.Also owned by Mannings is the{Penny Lounge}which is a fairly big arcade with lots of gambling machines and{arcade games. Quite a way from{Charlie Mannings is the Pier.In here there are not only machines ,there is also snooker and pool tables. Opposite the Pier is the Carousel. The{Carousel}has many games and is about the best arcade in Felixstowe. There is also the{Family Amusements} often it is called the new place,it is very modernized and has many video - games. On the side of this arcade is a little fast food place called the Tuck Box.
